description: When I first spoke to Ed on the phone, he guaranteed I wouldn't be disappointed when I saw him in person. More then one model has said that to me but there was something about the way he said it that wasn't coming from an inflated ego, but the kind of self-confidence that makes almost any man very sexy.When he did walk in the door, it was immediately clear this prime example of Puerto Rican muscle wasn't just ?any man,? but just the kind of handsome, well built stud that jack-off fantasies are made of.I've seen my share of tented briefs before so I knew what ever was stretching that cotton pouch out so far in front of him has to be as thick and meaty as the rest him. His surely didn't disappoint on that account either but it's what he does with the prize inside them that will make you feel like you are the real winner!  He shows off every angle, nook and cranny to the delight of our camera and the empties those balls with a tidal wave of sperm deep enough to swim in.
title: Boxing Shorts, Scene #01
